ROW.DESC: update <file> in the index using the current content found in the working tree
update the content of the current directory in the index
remove <file> from the index, or from the working tree and the index
store the current contents of the index in a new commit along with message <msg>
automatically stage files that have been modified and deleted, but new files you have not told Git about are not affected

display paths that have differences between the index file and the current HEAD commit, paths that have differences between the working tree and the index file, and paths in the working tree that are not tracked by Git

BLIST.TITLE: gitignore
BLIST.ITEM: It is possible to ignore files/directories in a given directory by listing them in the .ignore file of that directory.
